scripts.lint: deno lint analytics.js chichi.js group.js options.js queue.js sender.js session.js storage.js user.js utils.js
scripts.bundle: npm run lint && npm run test --fail-fast && ./node_modules/.bin/esbuild chichi.js --bundle --sourcemap --outfile=build/chichi.bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run transpile && npm run minify
scripts.build:es6: npm run lint && npm run test --fail-fast && ./node_modules/.bin/esbuild analytics.js --minify --bundle --sourcemap --define:'globalThis=window' --format=esm --target=es6 --outfile=dist/chichi.es6.min.js
